title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised and Expanded)
description: Detailed specifications for the neural training assistant project. This includes identifying target user segments (e.g., athletes, students, professionals), desired features (such as personalized training plans, progress tracking, integration with biometric data, gamification elements, real-time feedback mechanisms, adaptive learning algorithms, and adaptive learning algorithms), performance expectations (e.g., response time under 2 seconds, scalability to accommodate thousands of users, compatibility with various devices and platforms, robustness, and error tolerance), data privacy considerations (including anonymization techniques, secure data storage, and compliance with relevant regulations), accessibility requirements, and ongoing system improvement mechanisms (such as user feedback collection and implementation of machine learning models for continuous learning). Additionally, address potential technical debt, consider the need for documentation and testing, and perform a feasibility study on the integration of AI and neural stimulation technologies. The completed document will serve as a foundation for the project's development and will guide subsequent tasks. Involve stakeholders in the decision-making process where necessary. Upon completion, this task should be reviewed by the Project Manager before moving forward to implementation.

title: Design System Architecture for AsistenteEntrenamientoNeural (Revised and Updated - Ready for Final Review)
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AsistenteEntrenamientoNeural project. This includes detailed design of AI and neural stimulation components, data flow diagrams, integration points, addressing key considerations such as security, privacy, regulatory compliance, scalability, fault tolerance, performance optimization, usability, maintainability, accessibility, and ethics in the use of AI and neural stimulation technologies. The revision incorporates feedback received during the DRAFT phase, emphasizes on the importance of ensuring ethical use, and aims to create a modular, flexible, and extensible design for future enhancements and integrations with other systems. This task is now ready for final review before moving to implementation.

title: Develop AI and Machine Learning Models
description: Research, design, and develop the AI and machine learning models for physical and mental performance enhancement.

description: Design and develop the user interface and experience for the neural training assistant, including user onboarding, personalization, and feedback mechanisms.

description: Design and implement the data storage and management systems for user data, training data, and system logs.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures to protect user data and ensure system integrity, including encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan, including unit tests, integration tests, user acceptance testing, performance testing, security testing, accessibility testing, and non-functional testing such as usability and reliability. The plan should cover all components of the system, including the frontend, backend, and any third-party integrations. Ensure that the plan addresses testing for different environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and considers edge cases, error handling, scalability, performance under heavy loads, and resilience to failures. Additionally, provide clear documentation on testing procedures and results in a way that is easily understandable by both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the neural training assistant, covering installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
